meta-runner.name: PSCI: JMeter start
meta-runner.description: Start JMeter in foreground or background

param.name: jmeter.rootPath
param.spec: text description='Path to root JMeter directory' validationMode='not_empty' label='Path to JMeter' display='normal'

param.name: jmeter.javaPath
param.spec: text description='Path to java.exe that will be used by JMeter (leave empty for java.exe from path).' validationMode='any' label='Path to java' display='normal'

param.name: jmeter.jmxFile
param.spec: text description='Path to the JMeter JMX file (input)' validationMode='not_empty' label='Path to JMX file' display='normal'

param.name: jmeter.jtlFile
param.spec: text description='Path to the JMeter JTL file (output)' validationMode='not_empty' label='Path to JTL file' display='normal'

param.name: jmeter.properties
param.spec: text description='Comma-delimited JMeter properties (e.g. host=localhost,threads=1)' validationMode='any' label='JMeter Properties' display='normal'

param.name: jmeter.additionalParams
param.spec: text description='Additional string that will be passed to JMeter command line' validationMode='any' label='Additional JMeter command line' display='normal'

param.name: jmeter.runInBackground
param.spec: checkbox checkedValue='true' description='If checked, JMeter process will run in background' uncheckedValue='false' label='Run in background' display='normal'

param.name: jmeter.timeToWait
param.spec: text description='Time to wait (in seconds) after starting JMeter process. After this time it will be ensured that JMeter process is still running. Ignored if not run in background.' validationMode='any' label='Time to wait' display='normal'

param.name: jmeter.enabled
param.spec: text description='Put false if this whole step should not run.' validationMode='any' label='Enabled' display='normal'
